name: Name：
sell-modal-title: Please set a sell price in TRX
title-main: The First NFT & Yield Farming On TRON
subtitle-main:
Own 1 of only 10,000 NFTs existing on TRON and earn extra BKEY bonus! 
 Stake JustSwap LP tokens to earn you BKEY! Exchange Tron Mystery Box with BKEY to claim your very own NFT!
des-title-main-1: Own 1 of only 10,000 NFTs existing on TRON and earn extra BKEY bonus!
des-title-main-2: Stake JustSwap LP tokens to earn you BKEY!
des-title-main-3: Exchange Tron Mystery Box with BKEY to claim your very own NFT!
des-tron-mystery-box: Each Tron Mystery Box (TMB) is a blind box, containing one unique art image collectible. Each collectible is a non-fungible token (NFT) written in TRC721 standard, and only 10000 made, with four rarity levels: Common, Rare, Epic, and only 9 Legendary. You can either exchange for one TMB by paying 36 BKEY which is a TRC20 token, or directly buy one TMB by paying TRX (with extra 18 BKEY bonus!). Once a TMB is claimed, the collectible inside the box will be revealed. You won’t miss this time!
des-makes-TMB-unique: TMBs are 100% on the Tron Smart Chain, a low fee and high transaction speed blockchain which allows everyone to actively have a chance to own a piece of history. You can name your very own collectibles by burning BKEY, and each name is unique belonging to one NFT collectible. We also provide a marketplace where you can buy, trade or view all of the NFT collectibles. This project combines features and advantages of NFT and DeFi, and will work closely with existing projects such as JustSwap. In order to own more collectibles, you are encouraged to mint BKEYs by staking LP tokens in multiple mining pools. Our vision is that everyone has opportunity to own NFT assets based on the principle of fairness and openness.
title-getnft: Will you open a legendary TMB?
text-getnft-1: Buy 1 TMB by paying TRX and receive 18 bonus BKEY!
text-getnft-3: The price in TRX grows with cruve (the earlier the better)!
info-farm: Earn BKEYs by staking multiple JustSwap LP tokens
rule-farm: Stake anytime, unstake anytime, and get BKEY rewards instantly
abstract: We believe this is your opportunity to be among the first to participate in one of the largest collaborative NFT art projects on TRON. The interesting point is: you don’t know which art collectible is inside a blind box before you open it. It may be an Epic Ape or a Legendary Alien with smoking pipe, who knows. Anyway, the most important thing is to join it! There are two ways to acquire TMBs: purchasing by TRX (earn bonus!) and exchanging with BKEY tokens.
text-initial-TMB-offering: There are 3,000 unique art images insideTMBs to be sold on the initial offering period. Each of them is generated algorithmically. They have varying types, accessories, and rarity levels, which means all NFTs inside TMBs are rare, but some are rarer than others. The price in TRX grows with curve, so the earlier the cheaper! Once a TMB is sold, the art image inside the blind box will be revealed, and 18 bonus BKEYs will be sent to the buyer immediately. Due to expected high demand during the initial distribution period, we decided to limit a maximum of 10 TMBs per transaction.
text-exchange-BKEY-for-TMB: The Box Key (BKEY) is the native TRC-20 token of the TMB artwork. The remaining 7,000 TMBs can only be acquired by exchanging with BKEY tokens, and 1 TMB = 36 BKEY always. You can either earn bonus BKEYs by purchasing initial TMBs as described above or earn BKEYs by liquidity farming. In other words, the later way is for free :) We don’t charge any fees. During this stage, multiple staking pools will be open, and you are allowed to stake Liquidity Provider (LP) tokens to mine BKEYs. According to the smart contracts, you can stake anytime, unstake anytime, and get BKEY rewards instantly. You can obtain LP tokens by providing liquidity in JustSwap. Here are the farming details:
detail-exchange-BKEY-for-TMB-11: Pool 1: USDT-TRX JustSwap LP token, starting at 05/15/2021@21:00 (UTC)
detail-exchange-BKEY-for-TMB-12: Last for 60 days to 07/15/2021@21:00 (UTC), 1200 BKEY minted/day
detail-exchange-BKEY-for-TMB-21: Pool 2: SUN-TRX JustSwap LP token, starting at 05/15/2021@21:00 (UTC)
detail-exchange-BKEY-for-TMB-22: Last for 60 days to 07/15/2021@21:00 (UTC), 1200 BKEY minted/day
detail-exchange-BKEY-for-TMB-31: Pool 3: BTC-TRX JustSwap LP token, starting at 05/15/2021@21:00 (UTC)
detail-exchange-BKEY-for-TMB-32: Last for 60 days to 07/15/2021@21:00 (UTC), 1200 BKEY minted/day
detail-exchange-BKEY-for-TMB-41: Pool 4: TRX-BKEY JustSwap LP token, starting at 07/15/2021@21:00 (UTC)
detail-exchange-BKEY-for-TMB-42: Last for 300 days to 05/08/2022@21:00 (UTC), 3600 BKEY minted/day
text-name-your-NFTs: You are not only the collector but also the creator. To become a founding creator that shaped this raw canvas into a timeless work of art, you need to burn 9 BKEYs to name one of your collectible on-chain. The smart contracts require each name to be unique. Thus,it creates a second layer of scarcity within the art work.When farm is launched, 3600 BKEYs will be mined from the pools each day. After 360 days, approximately in May 2022, the last BKEY will be emitted and from then on, the supply will only decrease until one day, the last BKEY token is burnt.
detail-text-name-your-NFTs-2: 2. There is a limit of 25 symbols (including spaces)
detail-text-name-your-NFTs-3: 3. Case insensitive (i.e. "Alice" and "alice" are considered the same)
detail-text-name-your-NFTs-4: 4. There are no leading or trailing "spaces"
detail-text-name-your-NFTs-6: 6. Used names become available immediately after the name of the NFT was changed
text-raward-1: Bonus BKEYs in initial offering per new TMB purchased: 18
text-raward-2: Number of BKEYs needed to exchange for one new TMB: 36
text-raward-3: Number of BKEYs required for one name change: 9
text-raward-4: Number of BKEYs minted per day: 3,600
text-trading-1: Both the BKEY and NFT are tradable. For BKEYs, you can swap BKEYs with other types of token, or earn divides by providing liquidity in JustSwap. Once the staking period starts, 10,000 BKEYs will be added to JustSwap AMM DEX to inject initial liquidity.In the future, BKEY will be launched in major exchanges, such as Binance, Huobi Global, and Polonix. Thus, holding BKEYs or exchanging for TMBs, that is all your choice :)
text-trading-2: Like other NFT assets, which are developed upon the TRC-721/ERC-721 protocol, collectibles inside TMB are tradable as well. You can find a trading gateway on this website. Every owner can sell his collectibles by setting prices in TRX, and buyers can purchase them without paying any fees to our developing team :)
empty-nft: You don't have NFT assets yet
